content: A web portal is a website or intranet that serves as a single gateway to a wide range of resources and/or services, typically focused on a particular domain or community. It is designed to provide easy access to information, tools, and services related to a specific topic or group of users. A web portal usually has an active audience that can contribute to its development by visiting, registering, and returning to the portal. Users can find and share information, communicate with other members, and personalize their access to the portal.
